name: EWEMANITY
description:
A very rough unfinished prototype of what I wanted to do for the gamejam. Unfortunately I couldn't devote as much time to it as I wanted to, and then I got sick with covid. So this is the best you're going to get, but I still think there's fun to be had.

The homeworld has checked in on how their sheep colonists are doing on Earth, and are horrified to see that another species has become dominant. You are tasked with neutralising this threat. The homeworld is also really impatient, so you only have 3 minutes to get the job done. Can you get the TRUE ENDING?

Controls:

WASD for movement, LMB (left click) to activate the Ovinator.

Made for #TF22.
